desc: Same Day Flowers & Gifts Delivery across GTA, Event Design, locations in Square One and Hillcrest mall. insta @blossommomentsflowers Fresh cut and preserved flowers, plants, terrariums, forever roses, rose animals, soy candles, Provence soaps, Maison Berger, home decor & fragrances, gifts. Floral workshops.

layout.text: Place your order online for contactless delivery in Greater Toronto Area or pickup at Square One!
